statements: SELECT * FROM elected_officials;
SELECT name, position FROM elected_officials;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials WHERE government_level = 'Federal';
SELECT id, name, position FROM elected_officials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, position, government_level FROM elected_officials WHERE government_level = 'National' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, position, contact_info->>'email' AS email FROM elected_officials WHERE position = 'Senator' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials WHERE position = 'Governor' AND contact_info->>'phone' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, name, position, government_level FROM elected_officials WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' OR name LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY government_level ASC, name ASC;
SELECT position, COUNT(*) AS num_officials FROM elected_officials GROUP BY position HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_officials DESC;
SELECT * FROM officials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, level FROM officials WHERE level = 'Manager';
SELECT id, name, contact_info FROM officials ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_levels;
SELECT level_name, description FROM government_levels WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM officials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, contact_info FROM officials WHERE level = 'Manager' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT o.name, g.level_name, g.description FROM officials o JOIN government_levels g ON o.level = g.level_name;
SELECT * FROM government_levels WHERE description LIKE '%government%';
SELECT id, name, contact_info FROM officials WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials;
SELECT id, name, title FROM elected_officials WHERE level_of_government='State';
SELECT name, title, level_of_government FROM elected_officials ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contact_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT government_positions.position_name, elected_officials.name FROM government_positions JOIN elected_officials ON government_positions.id = elected_officials.id;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials;
SELECT name, title FROM elected_officials ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials WHERE level_of_government = 'Federal';
SELECT e.name, e.title, c.phone_number FROM elected_officials e JOIN contact_information c ON e.id = c.official_id;
SELECT p.position_name, e.name, e.title FROM government_positions p JOIN elected_officials e ON p.id = e.id ORDER BY p.position_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM elected_officials WHERE level_of_office = 'Mayor';
SELECT * FROM federal_officials ORDER BY party_affiliation ASC;
SELECT state_name, political_party FROM state_officials WHERE political_party = 'Republican';
SELECT locality_name, address FROM local_officials WHERE locality_name LIKE 'City%';
SELECT * FROM elected_officials WHERE level_of_office='Governor';
SELECT first_name, last_name, contact_info FROM elected_officials WHERE level_of_office='Mayor' ORDER BY last_name DESC;

SELECT federal_officials.office_location, federal_officials.party_affiliation, elected_officials.first_name, elected_officials.last_name FROM federal_officials INNER JOIN elected_officials ON federal_officials.elected_official_id = elected_officials.elected_official_id;

SELECT state_officials.state_name, state_officials.political_party, elected_officials.first_name, elected_officials.last_name FROM state_officials INNER JOIN elected_officials ON state_officials.elected_official_id = elected_officials.elected_official_id WHERE state_official_id > 10;

SELECT local_officials.locality_name, local_officials.address, elected_officials.first_name, elected_officials.last_name FROM local_officials INNER JOIN elected_officials ON local_officials.elected_official_id = elected_officials.elected_official_id WHERE elected_official_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY local_officials.locality_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM elected_officials;
SELECT name, position FROM federal_officials WHERE state='California';
SELECT official_id, name, position FROM local_officials WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM state_officials WHERE position='Governor' AND state='Texas';
SELECT contact_email FROM federal_officials WHERE position='Senator';
SELECT * FROM elected_officials WHERE position = 'Mayor';
SELECT name, position FROM federal_officials WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT official_id, position, name FROM state_officials ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM local_officials WHERE city = 'New York' AND contact_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT federal_officials.name, federal_officials.position, state_officials.contact_address FROM federal_officials JOIN state_officials ON federal_officials.official_id = state_officials.official_id;
